text: Hec ʙasarero nasazad, ki Alloh ʙo u suxan gujad magar az tariqi vahj jo az pasi parda jo in ki Alloh faristaero ʙifiristad, to ʙa farmoni U har ci ʙixohad, ʙa u vahj kunad. Haroina, U ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast: dar zot, nomho, sifatho va af'olas va hama maxluqot dar ʙaroʙari U sari taslim furudovarandaand va dar tadʙiri umuri xalqas hakim ast
